mapper.insert: insert into user values (default, #{username} , #{password} , #{name} , #{email} , #{role} , #{nickname} , default , #{oauth} , default , #{phoneNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.username, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.email_valid, u.role, u.nickname, u.phoneNumber, u.img, ou.id as oauth2_user_id, ou.user_id as ou_user_id, ou.oauth2_name, ou.provider FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN oauth2_user ou ON(ou.user_id = u.id) WHERE u.username = #{username}
